content.text: !!HOSTNAME!! can be downloaded from a deb repo or from git.
If you have Debian GNU/Linux Wheezy you can add the following into a new apt source file, e.g. /etc/apt/source.list.d/buetoworg.list, and run apt-get update;apt-get install !!HOSTNAME!!:
content.code: deb http://deb.buetow.org/apt wheezy main deb-src http://deb.buetow.org/apt wheezy main
content.text: To trust it please run "curl http://deb.buetow.org/apt/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add -".
